reviewText: Definitely worth the watch.  Its a modern day Cain / Abel / Prodigal Son story and its beautiful.  The end was amazing.  Loved the whole movie though because relationships are hard and its beautiful seeing the uniting....

It's a excellent movie.  I would recommend it to anyone who is searching for forgiveness.  If you have strayed away from God hopefully this movie will help you see it's never too late to come back to Him!
